data.title: Fullstack Developer
data.description: My experience is focused on the meticulous creation of hourly budgets for projects, combined with effective team management, where I successfully led a team of 2 people, coordinating tasks and optimizing resources. In addition, I excel in my ability to design and develop the logic and web interface necessary to obtain detailed and accurate booking statistics, using innovative technologies to ensure efficiency and accuracy at every step of the process.

data.title: Fullstack Web and Mobile Developer
data.description: During my time at the company, I stand out for my ability to capture 2 new clients in both mobile and web. In addition, I was in charge of preparing detailed budgets for projects on both platforms. In the mobile sector, I led the architecture planning, ensuring a solid and efficient structure. I managed a team of 3 talented individuals in mobile development, facilitating their collaboration and maximizing productivity. I also provided key advice to the web development team, contributing to their growth and success. My role as the company's point of reference was fundamental in the creation of new screens and logics, consolidating our position as innovative leaders in the industry.
